name: Cloning Clyde
description: Have you ever been cloned? Ever wonder what it would be like to be half chicken? Half monkey? Half frog? Well, wonder no more when you play Cloning Clyde. As Clyde, or one of his clones, work your way through the levels of the nefarious Dupliclone, Inc. building.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98 or higherProcessor: 2.0Ghz or higherMemory: 512 MBGraphics: Shader version 2.0 or higher (does not support Intel integrated graphics card)DirectX®: 9.0cHard Drive: 133MB

reviews.review_text: Great game for kids! Inventive puzzles and nice 'good for eye' graphics. If u want to change to a something less serious this platformer will do its job. Sure recommendations!
At it's heart, Cloning Clyde is a puzzle platformer. Multiple player charakters, multiple ablities. But this one has more, namely the goofy presentation.

nice little platform indie game. you have to fight robots and other enemies, you can clone yourself to complete different tasks and you can mutate with animals and objects.   maybe interesting for the girls and shirtlifters among yourselves: clyde doesnt wear pants.   all together its fun to play, the sounds, graphics and animations are ok for this kind of game. cloning clyde has 40 short levels with different environments and is worth the little price.

Have you ever wondered what game is suitable for individuals (like you) with multiple personality disorder? Have you ever wanted to play with your buddies of another personality? Look no further, this is the perfect game for you, you, you and the other you. You guys are given the chance to play with one another, go on an adventure together, taking on various roles and leave notes for one another. Communications between you, you, you and you hasn't been so easy.
Already Reviewed on Marooners' Rock! This game is worth the 5 bucks!
